title: FTP Vulnerable File Disclosure
description: An FTP server is misconfigured, allowing unauthorized access to sensitive files. Exploit the misconfiguration to find the flag.
hints: Check if anonymous FTP access is enabled.
Look around the directories for any accessible sensitive files.
Try different FTP commands to see file listings.
learningObjectives: Learn to enumerate FTP servers for publicly accessible files
Practice accessing FTP services from a penetration testing perspective
